events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection, resulting in moderate damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after verifying the details provided by the insured about the car collision.
An agent was assigned to manage the claim and oversee the subsequent investigation and communication with the insured.
The insured received formal acknowledgment of the claim submission and was informed about the next steps in the process.
Requested supporting documents including the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of the driving license.
The insured submitted all requested documents promptly, including vehicle damage photographs and official police accident report.
The claims department initiated an investigation to verify the circumstances and liability related to the reported auto collision.
Investigation was completed confirming the insured was not at fault and that damages are covered under the policy terms.
A settlement amount was proposed based on the vehicle repair estimates and the terms of the insurance policy.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the speed and transparency of the claim process and the proposed settlement.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement offer by the insured.
The approved settlement payment was issued to the insured's designated bank account swiftly as per standard procedures.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the insured received the payment and no further issues were pending.
